markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wounded Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=143) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 90 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You take damage and are capable of entering a rage.

</column>

---

You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you. You Rage.
name: Wounded Rage
